docs.lead_paragraph: The disturbing events in Europe, last week have-added new significance to a voluntary program toeing conducted by young scientists in two communities of our nation.

headline.main: Explaining Radiation; Scientists in 2 Cities Set Up Groups to Inform Public on Facts in Simple Talks

docs.abstract: Dr Rusk article on programs of NY Scientists Com for Radiation Information and Greater St Louis Citizens Com for Nuclear Information
